channel.title: [delta-317]few probblems im having [unsolved]
channel.description:
ive made a 317 rsps using the dragon-history base and im having a few problems.
1.ive added a custom shield but when i try to spawn ingame it appears in the weapon slot i've tried adding it to the item.java but it still doesnt work properly.
2. npc's hit to high: when im fighting a npc say a level 43 (i'm at level 126) they still manage to kill/nearly kill me. anybody know how to solve this problem
3. disconnecting when in combat: when i try to attack a npc the game freezes and disconnects i thought it was just cus i was spawning npc's but even if i try to attack a normal npc it freezes. any ideas??
4.errors when compiling: i've added a "donator" command to the client.java that teleports you to the donator zone and if you're not at donator status it sends the message "you need to donate to teleport here" when i compiled it said 1 error ";" expected so i went back added the ";" complied and i get 100 errors. anybody know how to solve this.
Sorry for any spelling mistakes so don't try to flame me by saying "you misspelled ....." Appreciate any help on any of my questions. [i]~Bibbobbib~[/i]
Edit: if any of these problems are unsolvable then i can start again it isn't a major problem.

item.title: [delta-317]few probblems im having [unsolved]
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

ive made a 317 rsps using the dragon-history base and im having a few problems.

1.ive added a custom shield but when i try to spawn ingame it appears in the weapon slot i’ve tried adding it to the item.java but it still doesnt work properly.

  1. npc’s hit to high: when im fighting a npc say a level 43 (i’m at level 126) they still manage to kill/nearly kill me. anybody know how to solve this problem

  2. disconnecting when in combat: when i try to attack a npc the game freezes and disconnects i thought it was just cus i was spawning npc’s but even if i try to attack a normal npc it freezes. any ideas??

4.errors when compiling: i’ve added a “donator” command to the client.java that teleports you to the donator zone and if you’re not at donator status it sends the message “you need to donate to teleport here” when i compiled it said 1 error “;” expected so i went back added the “;” complied and i get 100 errors. anybody know how to solve this.

Sorry for any spelling mistakes so don’t try to flame me by saying “you misspelled …”
Appreciate any help on any of my questions.
~Bibbobbib~

Edit: if any of these problems are unsolvable then i can start again it isn’t a major problem.
